column6: While Spider-Man bounces back from the brutal beating he received at the hands of the Rhino, the Black Cat takes it upon herself to deliver a little payback. Of course, since he outweighs her by a few tons, Felicia Hardy might need some help. Calling...the Puma!
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | penciller:Sean Chen | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:Dan Kemp | penciller (cover):Angel Medina | letterer:Cory Petit
